DepositWithdrawal

Developer or official representative of an asset has the right to temporarily close deposits/withdrawals/trade of his asset. Please, do your own research of coin developer reliability and market prospects of the assets you are planning to trade in. The Exchange is not liable to conduct research and provide guarantees for the quality of assets or the developer reliability. The Exchange provides historical data on executed orders, incoming and outgoing transactions for the latest 30 days only. If you need older data, please, make backup copies using a special tool in "Transactions" section located at the bottom of the page. Please, note, that storage period for canceled orders (without successful trades) is 1 to 7 days.
